tool.name: SAGA.contrib_perego.4
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayMASK False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.contrib_perego.4 INPUT $INPUT MASK $MASK V $V RX $RX RY $RY prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: This must be your input data of type grid. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: MASK
param.label: Mask Grid
param.help: This grid indicates the cells you want calculate the average. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: V
param.label: Mask value
param.help: Value of right cells in the Mask Grid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Average With Mask 2 calculates average for cells specified by a mask grid. However cell excluded by the mask grid are used in the average calculation for right pixels.
